text:
Berlin, Germany -- Ecosia -- User Experience Lead -- Full time / no remote.

We are a green startup from Berlin. Currently we are looking for a talented UX lead to help us with our mission.

Want to help us end the deforestation while working with a friendly, international team in a cozy office?

Take a look in here: http://www.bcorporation.net/community/jobs-board/ecosia-gmbh...

You can also read more about us: https://www.ecosia.org/what
